message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $10,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I understand your position, Alice. Let's try $9,500 as my maximum offer for the product.
